lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Charles Lieberman of Manufacturers Hanover Securities Corp said single-family homes would account for most of the housing starts drop although Smith Barney's Greenbaum saw signs of stabilization in both the single- and multi-family sectors.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Although underlying fundamentals remain strong -- mortgage rate stability, healthy income gains -- warmer than usual weather undoubtedly also had some influence in pushing starts higher in both months," he added.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Economists at Shearson Lehman Brothers Inc were more succinct in a weekly newsletter: "a slight decline across the board, no particular economic reason, mostly weather."
